name: 异星传奇-单机不氪金生存冒险游戏
name_original: 异星传奇-单机不氪金生存冒险游戏
description:
【game introduction】
"Different Legends" is a science fiction survival adventure plus business class mobile game. It is described that the male protagonist runs a company specializing in the development of outer space technology flying products. At the new aircraft test flight ceremony, the male protagonist was sent to the unknown lone star because of his carelessness. A strange creature with horror and horror, the male protagonist must collect and make props while ensuring his own safety and health, and finally repair the damaged spacecraft and return to Earth.
【team introduction】
We are a 7-person independent development team, BOSS is very different: a team full of lifelessness and some kind of unspeakable temperament.
[creator of depression]
When I set up this game, I had a lot of ideas. I saw a movie called "Dooms of the End of the World". The father said to his son, "There is a flame in my heart." What we understand in this sentence means, "Whenever there is strong, optimistic and hope in your heart." Sometimes I often think that if I am in a world, I shouldn’t call the phone. You can make a choice in the desperate situation where you can eat without spicy food. . . Don't get me wrong, the above words are just the creators of the slang, and this game has no connection with "Dooms of the End".
[game features]
- Unique, exaggerated art cartoon setting role
- all kinds of wonderful equipment but weapons that are said to be very useful
- Fun to collect and manufacture a variety of items for cooking, tools, weapons, equipment
- The unique space pace of the male protagonist who caused the legs to be less flexible because of the landing. . .
- Extreme night, extreme rain, acid rain season, monsoon season, students who have no chance to experience in the Antarctic, Arctic and nuclear polluted areas can try to experience it rough
- The joystick comes with the home pointing cursor (green) to save the player the inconvenience of frequently watching small maps (player: this?.....)
-Automatic progress save function, caring for disabled players
【contact us】
There are still many shortcomings in our game. I hope that players will make more suggestions and help us improve it.
Our QQ contact group:
Alien Legend - Player Group 01: 767260605 (There are many pseudo-official representatives of the players, and of course official representatives)
Questions can be fed back here~ Welcome to your arrival! ~
